summary: Adds a small bed and end table for the player to use at the Bards College.
descriptionHtml:
Disappointed that the Bards College do not even offer a bed to sleep in for its newest member, this mod simply extends the lower hallway and adds a small, single bed and end table container for the player to use.
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35384-1-1368196634.jpg[/img]
Its on the lower floor, where all the other students of the college sleep.

Compatibility: Any other mod that modifies the interior cell of the Bards College will probably cause problems.
author: Makk128
